intro.heading: Color Memory
intro.desc: Test your memory and knowledge of color with this simple guessing game. Can you memorize a color and pick it out of a line up?

instructions: You will be shown a square of color for 15 seconds. Afterwards, you must pick the color that matches the color you just saw.

results.correct-text: You guessed the color! Congrats, play again?
results.incorrect-text: Sorry you didn't quite get that right, what to try again?
